name: Passhold
description:
(Ludum Dare 44," Life is currency")

It's a plateformer about a character who get old really fast.

He must reach the heart in order to survive.

It's a basic plateformer with an stressful timer , and with some skilled levels.

At the beginning of each level you can buy with a part of your lifetime bonus.

Make the best time you can per level, enjoy the game !

(There is 3 levels for this jam, but I will build new levels very soon.)

I made  this game alone in 12h X). It was a really great experience!

Maybe  I will not forget the beginning of the next Ludum dare ^^'.
